title: Korean Doenjang-Jjigae (Soybean Paste Soup)
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cubed
1  zucchini, halved and cut into 1/2-inch slices
method: Step 1: Bring vegetable stock and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Stir in garlic and soybean paste, stirring until the paste dissolves.
Step 2: Stir in tofu, green onion, zucchini, and jalapeño. Allow soup to return to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes.
